alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:43AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fayette and northeastern Shelby Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arlington, or 10 miles northeast of Bartlett, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Lakeland, Arlington, Somerville, Eads, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Piperton, Gallaway, Moscow, Williston, Braden, Redwood, Hickory Withe, Pattersonville, Brunswick, Fisherville, Laconia and Elba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
